thread.title: Bill Clinton Speaks At UConn - Courant
thread.title_full: Bill Clinton Speaks At UConn - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: Bill Clinton Speaks At UConn - Courant
text:
Caption Bill Clinton Speaks At UConn Cloe Poisson / Hartford Courant President Bill Clinton (center) accepts the Thomas J. Dodd Prize in International Justice and Human Rights from Helena Foulkes, chair of the national advisory board for the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, while former U.S. Sen. Chris Dodd applauds at left, during a ceremony at the Jorgensen Auditorium on the UConn campus Thursday evening. Foulkes is Senator Dodd's niece. Clinton was a co-recipient of the award along with Molly Melching, (not pictured) founder and CEO of Tostan, an international human rights organization.
President Bill Clinton (center) accepts the Thomas J. Dodd Prize in International Justice and Human Rights from Helena Foulkes, chair of the national advisory board for the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, while former U.S. Sen. Chris Dodd applauds at left, during a ceremony at the Jorgensen Auditorium on the UConn campus Thursday evening. Foulkes is Senator Dodd's niece. Clinton was a co-recipient of the award along with Molly Melching, (not pictured) founder and CEO of Tostan, an international human rights organization.
(Cloe Poisson / Hartford Courant) Bill Clinton Speaks At UConn Cloe Poisson President Bill Clinton makes a point while giving the keynote address after being awarded the Thomas J. Dodd Prize in International Justice and Human Rights during a ceremony at the Jorgensen Auditorium on the UConn campus.
President Bill Clinton makes a point while giving the keynote address after being awarded the Thomas J. Dodd Prize in International Justice and Human Rights during a ceremony at the Jorgensen Auditorium on the UConn campus.
(Cloe Poisson) See more galleries Former President Bill Clinton visited UConn on Oct. 15 to accept the Thomas J. Dodd Prize in International Justice and Human Rights, named for the late congressman and senator from Connecticut and former U.S. Sen. Chris Dodd's father.
This photo gallery is featured in these articles: Connecticut Bill Clinton Comes To Connecticut To Raise Money and Collect Dodd Prize
